Instruction: Dice the guavas, tomato, red onion, and jalapeno pepper.
In a bowl, combine the diced guava, tomato, red onion, jalapeno pepper, and chopped fresh cilantro.
Add lime juice and salt to taste.
Mix well until all ingredients are evenly combined.
Refrigerate for at least 30 minutes before serving to allow the flavors to meld.
Serve chilled as a refreshing salsa with tortilla chips or grilled meats.
